reviews.review: In this game, you need to play with your friends because you can communicate with them. And the game will be more easier. Actually, you need to assign your friends what to do in which they could do.
There should never be a game where the total of all the dlc is 8x the amount than the game is. also lets not forget as well the developers dont care about half of us!
Nice horror survival game, with tension! 7/10

I love this game, repettitive but this game doesnt get boring. the only thing i hate is... the game is survivor sided like were dealing with famous killers. survivors always genrushing and ppl telling the killer to dont whine and patrol gens properly, the game ends too fast.
